PackageOracle.name: DA_RECV_SESSION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_RECV_SESSION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.13.343229000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,content_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,recv_session_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,content_access_device_id IN NUMBER
,bcst_channel_id IN NUMBER
,station_call_sign_id IN NUMBER
,blg_amt IN NUMBER
,pay_per_view_ind IN NUMBER
,from_inter_prg_guide_ind IN NUMBER
,vod_request_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,vod_ind IN NUMBER
,requesting_individual_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,content_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_recv_session;

body.name: DA_RECV_SESSION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_RECV_SESSION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.13.353453000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,content_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,recv_session_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,content_access_device_id IN NUMBER
,bcst_channel_id IN NUMBER
,station_call_sign_id IN NUMBER
,blg_amt IN NUMBER
,pay_per_view_ind IN NUMBER
,from_inter_prg_guide_ind IN NUMBER
,vod_request_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,vod_ind IN NUMBER
,requesting_individual_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_recv_session.add, parms=' || receiving_access_method_id || '|' || content_id || '|' || recv_session_start_dttm || '|' || recv_session_end_dttm || '|' || content_access_device_id || '|' || bcst_channel_id || '|' || station_call_sign_id || '|' || blg_amt || '|' || pay_per_view_ind || '|' || from_inter_prg_guide_ind || '|' || vod_request_type_cd || '|' || vod_ind || '|' || requesting_individual_party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_recv_session a
(
a.receiving_access_method_id
,a.content_id
,a.recv_session_start_dttm
,a.recv_session_end_dttm
,a.content_access_device_id
,a.bcst_channel_id
,a.station_call_sign_id
,a.blg_amt
,a.pay_per_view_ind
,a.from_inter_prg_guide_ind
,a.vod_request_type_cd
,a.vod_ind
,a.requesting_individual_party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.receiving_access_method_id
,add.content_id
,add.recv_session_start_dttm
,add.recv_session_end_dttm
,add.content_access_device_id
,add.bcst_channel_id
,add.station_call_sign_id
,add.blg_amt
,add.pay_per_view_ind
,add.from_inter_prg_guide_ind
,add.vod_request_type_cd
,add.vod_ind
,add.requesting_individual_party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_recv_session.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,receiving_access_method_id IN NUMBER
,content_id IN NUMBER
,recv_session_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_recv_session.del, parms=' || receiving_access_method_id || '|' || content_id || '|' || recv_session_start_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_recv_session a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.receiving_access_method_id = del.receiving_access_method_id
AND a.content_id = del.content_id
AND a.recv_session_start_dttm = del.recv_session_start_dttm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_recv_session.del');

END del;

END da_recv_session;
